flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Before you begin building, I would like you to note that this marshmallow gun is quite extreme, so if you are looking for an average gun, you may consider making a more simple one.

Here is a link to a good site to help you do this:

http://www.instructables.com/id/Marshmal...

Thanks!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Before you begin building, I would like you to note that this marshmallow gun is quite extreme, so if you are looking for an average gun, you may consider making a more simple one.

Here is a link to a good site to help you do this:

http://www.instructables.com/id/Marshmal...

Thanks!
guide.summary: In this guide, I will show you how to make a marshmallow gun, using PVC pipe and a bicycle pump.
guide.title: Extreme Marshmallow Gun
